009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.threshold.BackgroundMode;
014import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.OtsuThresholder;
015import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
016
017/**
018 * This thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square
019 * sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image 
020 * (using an Otsu thresholder) and interpolates linearly between 
021 * these local thresholds.
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 * @version 2022/04/02
025 */
026public class InterpolatingThresholder extends AdaptiveThresholder {
027        
028        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
029                @DialogLabel("Tile size")
030                public int tileSize = 32;
031                
032                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
033                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
034        }
035        
036        private final Parameters params;
037        
038        public InterpolatingThresholder() {
039                this.params = new Parameters();
040        }
041        
042        public InterpolatingThresholder(Parameters params) {
043                this.params = params;
044        }
045
046        @Override
047        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
048                final int W = ip.getWidth();
049                final int H = ip.getHeight();
050                final int tileSize = params.tileSize;
051                
052                // determine number of tiles
053                int nW = (W % tileSize == 0) ? (W / tileSize + 1) : (W / tileSize + 2);
054                int nH = (H % tileSize == 0) ? (H / tileSize + 1) : (H / tileSize + 2);
055                
056                int[][] tiles = new int[nW][nH];
057                int s0 = tileSize / 2;  // center of title (s0 + s1 = tileSize)
058//              int s1 = tileSize - s0;
059
060                // compute threshold for each tile
061                int[] h = new int[256];
062                OtsuThresholder thr = new OtsuThresholder();
063
064                int q_ = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK) ? 256 : 0;
065
066                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
067                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
068                                getSubimageHistogram(ip, u0 - s0, v0 - s0, tileSize, h);
069                                int q = thr.getThreshold(h);
070                                if (q < 0) q = q_; // no threshold found in this tile
071                                tiles[i][j] = q;
072                                //IJ.log(i + "/" + j + ": " + q);
073                        }
074                }
075                
076                ByteProcessor thrIp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
077                
078                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
079                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
080                                // Rectangle re = new Rectangle(u0-s0, v0-s0, u0-s0+tileSize, v0-s0+tileSize);
081                                for (int v = v0 - s0; v < v0 - s0 + tileSize; v++) {
082                                        for (int u = u0 - s0; u < u0 - s0 + tileSize; u++) {
083                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, tiles[i][j]);
084                                        }
085                                }
086                        }
087                }
088                
089                // linearly interpolate
090                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH - 1; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
091                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW - 1; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
092                                int A = tiles[i][j];
093                                int B = tiles[i + 1][j];
094                                int C = tiles[i][j + 1];
095                                int D = tiles[i + 1][j + 1];
096
097                                // interpolate within [u0, v0, u0 + tileSize, v0 + tileSize]
098                                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + tileSize; v++) {
099                                        double dy = (double) (v - v0) / tileSize;
100                                        double AC = A + dy * (C - A);
101                                        double BD = B + dy * (D - B);
102                                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + tileSize; u++) {
103                                                double dx = (double) (u - u0) / tileSize;
104                                                double ABCD = AC + dx * (BD - AC);
105                                                // thrIp.putPixel(u,v,tiles[i][j]);
106                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, (int) Math.rint(ABCD));
107                                        }
108                                }
109
110                        }
111                }
112                        
113                return thrIp;
114        }
115        
116        private void getSubimageHistogram(ByteProcessor ip, int u0, int v0, int size, int[] h) {
117                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
118                        h[i] = 0;
119                }
120                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + size; v++) {
121                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + size; u++) {
122                                int p = getPaddedPixel(ip, u, v);
123                                h[p]++;
124                        }
125                }
126        }
127
128}
